lead_paragraph: The step followed months of political paralysis and discord over who should form a government after inconclusive voting in December.

headline.print_headline: Spain’s King Dissolves Parliament, Clearing Way for Elections
headline.main: King Felipe of Spain Dissolves Parliament, Clearing Way for New Elections

snippet: The step followed months of political paralysis and discord over who should form a government after inconclusive voting in December.
abstract: King Felipe VI of Spain exercises power to dissolve Parliament and call for rerun elections for first time in nation's democratic history; move is aimed at ending months of paralysis and strife following inconclusive elections in December.
